product_specification.vision_statement: Empowering ADHD brains to achieve focused productivity through adaptive AI that works with, not against, natural attention patterns

target_market.primary_segment: Adults with ADHD (25-45) seeking executive function support
target_market.secondary_segment: Neurodivergent professionals struggling with traditional productivity tools
target_market.market_size: Growing awareness market - 4.4% of US adults have ADHD, estimated 14.4M people

core_value_proposition.primary_benefit: AI that adapts to your ADHD brain patterns instead of forcing rigid structure
differentiation_factors: Visual-first interface designed for ADHD attention patterns
Energy-based task matching using circadian and focus state awareness
Adaptive interface that changes based on current cognitive load
No punishment/shame mechanics - celebrates neurotype differences
competitive_advantages: Only app specifically trained on ADHD attention research
Visual workflow systems that match ADHD processing style
Flexible scheduling that accommodates hyperfocus and recovery cycles
Built-in executive function scaffolding and working memory support

mvp_features.description: Quick visual energy/focus assessment using color-coded interface
mvp_features.user_story: As an ADHD user, I want to quickly indicate my current energy state so the app can suggest appropriate tasks

mvp_features.description: Machine learning system that suggests tasks based on current energy and historical patterns
mvp_features.user_story: As an ADHD user, I want task suggestions that match my current mental state

mvp_features.description: Flexible focus periods with ADHD-friendly break patterns
mvp_features.user_story: As an ADHD user, I want focus sessions that adapt to my attention span

mvp_features.description: Kanban-style visual workflow optimized for ADHD processing
mvp_features.user_story: As an ADHD user, I want to see my tasks in a visual format that makes sense to my brain

premium_features.description: Personalized productivity insights and pattern recognition
premium_features.rationale: Intensive AI processing and personalized model training

premium_features.description: Collaborative planning with ADHD-aware communication tools
premium_features.rationale: Multi-user infrastructure and advanced sharing controls
Licensed audio content and advanced customization options

premium_features.description: Detailed insights into cognitive patterns and improvement areas
premium_features.rationale: Advanced analytics processing and research-backed insights

adhd_specific: Clear visual hierarchy with reduced distractions
Consistent navigation patterns to reduce decision fatigue
accessibility_standards.wcag_compliance: WCAG 2.1 AA with additional ADHD accommodations
accessibility_standards.platform_guidelines: iOS HIG and Material Design with neurodivergent adaptations

platform_support.offline_capability: Core functionality works offline with sync when connected

performance_standards.memory_efficiency: Optimized for older devices and multitasking users
performance_standards.battery_impact: Minimal background processing to avoid device anxiety
